```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
```




## Scatterplot

```{r scatterplot}
data(mpg)

g <- ggplot(mpg, aes(x = displ, y = hwy))
g + geom_point()

```

## `colors`

```{r colors}
g <- ggplot(mpg, aes(x = displ, y = hwy, color = class)) + 
  geom_point()
g

```
  
## Convert `colors` to `shape`
  
```{r b&w}
g <- ggplot(mpg, aes(x = displ, y = hwy, shape = class)) + 
  geom_point()
g

```

## Shape Size

```{r shape size}
g <- ggplot(mpg, aes(x = displ, y = hwy, shape = class)) + 
  geom_point()
g

```
